channel.description: Week 3 Announcements This Week 9/6: Lab 1 Due 7 PM 9/11: Week 2 Quizzes 9/20: Lab 2 9/20: Week 2 Discussion Discussion Sessions Thursdays 1 - 2 PM Office Hours Speaker Invites Sent First Speaker Soon! Lab 2 Redo Lab 1 using Puppet Reinstall OS, Install Puppet, Make Snapshot Write Puppet Manifest & Test Keep it Simple! Use puppet resource to query Solutions < 200 LOC Keep in Touch!
